verses.t: Praise{H1984} Lordye the {H3050}. Praise{H1984} ye the name{H8034} Lordof the {H3068}; praise{H1984} him, O ye servants{H5650} Lordof the {H3068}.
Ye that stand{H5975} in the house{H1004} Lordof the {H3068}, in the courts{H2691} of the house{H1004} of our God{H430},
Praise{H1984} Lordthe {H3050}; Lordfor the {H3068} is good{H2896}: sing praises{H2167} unto his name{H8034}; for it is pleasant{H5273}.
LordFor the {H3050} hath chosen{H977} Jacob{H3290} unto himself, and Israel{H3478} for his peculiar treasure{H5459}.
For I know{H3045} Lordthat the {H3068} is great{H1419}, and that our Lord{H113} is above all gods{H430}.
LordWhatsoever the {H3068} pleased{H2654}, that did{H6213} he in heaven{H8064}, and in earth{H776}, in the seas{H3220}, and all deep places{H8415}.

He causeth the vapours{H5387} to ascend{H5927} from the ends{H7097} of the earth{H776}; he maketh{H6213} lightnings{H1300} for the rain{H4306}; he bringeth{H3318} the wind{H7307} out of his treasuries{H214}.
Who smote{H5221} the firstborn{H1060} of Egypt{H4714}, both of man{H120} and beast{H929}.both…: Heb. from man unto beast
Who sent{H7971} tokens{H226} and wonders{H4159} into the midst{H8432} of thee, O Egypt{H4714}, upon Pharaoh{H6547}, and upon all his servants{H5650}.
Who smote{H5221} great{H7227} nations{H1471}, and slew{H2026} mighty{H6099} kings{H4428};
Sihon{H5511} king{H4428} of the Amorites{H567}, and Og{H5747} king{H4428} of Bashan{H1316}, and all the kingdoms{H4467} of Canaan{H3667}:
And gave{H5414} their land{H776} for an heritage{H5159}, an heritage{H5159} unto Israel{H3478} his people{H5971}.
Thy name{H8034}, LordO {H3068}, endureth for ever{H5769}; and thy memorial{H2143}, LordO {H3068}, throughout all{H1755} generations{H1755}.throughout…: Heb. to generation and generation
LordFor the {H3068} will judge{H1777} his people{H5971}, and he will repent{H5162} himself concerning his servants{H5650}.
The idols{H6091} of the heathen{H1471} are silver{H3701} and gold{H2091}, the work{H4639} of men's{H120} hands{H3027}.
They have mouths{H6310}, but they speak{H1696} not; eyes{H5869} have they, but they see{H7200} not;
They have ears{H241}, but they hear{H238} not; neither is there{H3426} any breath{H7307} in their mouths{H6310}.
They that make{H6213} them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth{H982} in them.
Bless{H1288} Lordthe {H3068}, O house{H1004} of Israel{H3478}: bless{H1288} Lordthe {H3068}, O house{H1004} of Aaron{H175}:
Bless{H1288} Lordthe {H3068}, O house{H1004} of Levi{H3878}: ye that fear{H3373} Lordthe {H3068}, bless{H1288} Lordthe {H3068}.
Blessed{H1288} Lordbe the {H3068} out of Zion{H6726}, which dwelleth{H7931} at Jerusalem{H3389}. Praise{H1984} Lordye the {H3050}.
